nodes.text: The JT-2 Jetpack was a type of jetpack produced by Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc. during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
The MSM JT-2 Jetpack was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the Master's Shadow Pack, and is the first jetpack mount to be added to the game.
